subScenes.name: 迟到道歉
subScenes.description: 因堵车迟到，向朋友真诚道歉

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, sorry I'm late—traffic was insane!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿，抱歉我迟到了，路上堵得要命！

responses.text: No worries, I get it—traffic’s a nightmare today.
responses.text_cn: 别在意，今天交通太糟了。

responses.text: That’s okay, but next time text me if you’re stuck?
responses.text_cn: 没事，下次堵车记得发个消息？

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松语气缓解对方愧疚感

qaPairs.speakerText: I really hate keeping you waiting—can I buy you coffee?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我真的不想让你等，我请你喝咖啡吧？

responses.text: That’s so nice of you—latte with oat milk, please!
responses.text_cn: 你太贴心了，燕麦拿铁谢谢！

responses.text: Nah, don’t stress—just be on time next time!

qaPairs.usageNote: 补偿提议要具体，显得真诚

subScenes.name: 工作失误
subScenes.description: 因疏忽错过截止时间，向同事道歉

qaPairs.speakerText: I messed up the report—I sent the wrong version.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我搞砸了报告，发错版本了。

responses.text: Ugh, that’s rough—but can you resend it by 3?
responses.text_cn: 糟了，但你能三点前重发吗？

responses.text: I’m so sorry—I’ll fix it right away and add a summary.
responses.text_cn: 太抱歉了，我马上重发并加个摘要。

qaPairs.usageNote: 道歉后立即给出解决方案

qaPairs.speakerText: I’ll make it up to you—next team lunch’s on me.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我一定补偿你，下次团队聚餐我请。

responses.text: Deal! But no more mistakes, okay?
responses.text_cn: 一言为定，别再出错了哈！

qaPairs.usageNote: 补偿要具体，语气带点幽默更好

subScenes.name: 取消计划
subScenes.description: 临时取消约会，向朋友解释原因

qaPairs.speakerText: I’m so sorry—I’ve gotta cancel tonight. My dog’s sick.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 太抱歉了，今晚得取消，我狗生病了。

responses.text: Oh no! Hope Fido’s okay—let’s reschedule?
responses.text_cn: 天啊！希望狗狗没事，我们改天再约？

responses.text: That’s fine—just text me when you’re free.

qaPairs.usageNote: 解释原因要真实，避免借口感

qaPairs.speakerText: I’ll make it up to you—how about dinner this weekend?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我一定补偿你，这周末一起吃饭？

responses.text: Yes! Italian? I’ve been craving pasta!
responses.text_cn: 好啊！意式？我想吃意面了！

responses.text: Sure, but no more last-minute cancels!

qaPairs.usageNote: 提出具体补偿方案，提升诚意
